title: Tobira wo Akete (1995)
synopsis: It's bedtime, and Nonoko is about to go to sleep. But the play of light and shadow on those objects on the wall look almost like... a person.
staff: [['Morimoto, Kouji', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Screenplay']], ['Fukushima, Atsuko', ['Key Animation']], ['Andou, Hiroaki', ['Special Effects']], ['Kuroda, Yoshio', ['Planning']]]
